respected. His whole time was taken up with dinners and balls and was spent chiefly at Prince Vasili's house in the company of the stout princess, his wife, and his beautiful daugh- ter Hdene. 
Like the others, Anna Pdvlovna Sch^rer showed Pierre the change of attitude toward him that had taken place in society.
